welcome.heading: Ask about climbing conditions
welcome.description: Get real-time weather, friction analysis, and optimal climbing windows for any crag worldwide

reasons.tempTooHigh: Temperature too high - fingers may slip

reasons.readyInHours: Will be ready to climb in ~{{hours}} hours

warnings.highHumidity: High humidity ({{humidity}}%) - rock can be slippery
warnings.wetDangerousSandstone: Rock is currently wet - dangerous to climb (sandstone becomes weak when wet)
warnings.wetSlippery: Rock is currently wet - slippery conditions
warnings.veryHighWinds: Very high winds ({{wind}} km/h) - danger of blown off

disambiguation.foundMultipleLocations: Found multiple locations for "{{location}}". Please choose one:

features.heading: Everything You Need
features.subheading: Comprehensive climbing conditions at your fingertips, completely free

realTimeWeather.title: Real-time Weather
realTimeWeather.description: Accurate forecasts from Open-Meteo with sun/shade calculations for specific sectors

chatInterface.title: Chat Interface
chatInterface.description: Natural language queries powered by AI. Ask in any language, get instant answers

communityReports.title: Community Reports
communityReports.description: Share and confirm current conditions. Help fellow climbers with real-time updates

globalCoverage.title: Global Coverage
globalCoverage.description: Any crag or sector worldwide via OpenBeta database integration

worksOffline.title: Works Offline
worksOffline.description: Local-first design. Save data offline and sync across devices with a sync key

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.description: Anonymous by default. No accounts required. Your data stays yours

warning.title: Keep your sync key private
